V0002_01_00_00_0.text: There can be only one winner, and you're looking at him!

V0002_01_00_01_0.text: Let's see if you have the cards to challenge me.

V0002_01_00_03_0.text: I'll show this sniveling puppy that he's more bark than bite!

V0002_01_00_04_0.text: Every Duel I've fought has led up to THIS moment! The moment I finally take down Yugi Muto and regain my top Dueling status!

V0002_01_00_05_0.text: I will defeat you once and for all!

V0002_01_00_06_0.text: I don't believe in any of your destiny nonsense, is that clear?

V0002_01_00_06_1.text: The only thing I believe in is the power of my cards to take you down!

V0002_01_00_08_0.text: There can be only one winner, and you're looking at him!

V0002_03_00_01_0.text: It's clearly obvious that my strategies are superior to yours.

V0002_05_00_00_0.text: Only the strongest Duelist can wield the power of a god!

V0002_06_01_03_0.text: You think that'll work on me?

V0002_08_00_00_0.text: I activate the Spell - Soul Exchange!

V0002_08_00_01_1.text: The Trap Card - Crush Card Virus activates!

V0002_08_00_02_0.text: I activate my Spell - Monster Reborn!

V0002_08_00_03_1.text: The Trap Card - Deck Devastation Virus activates!

V0002_08_00_04_1.text: The Trap Card - Eradicator Epidemic Virus activates!

V0002_08_00_05_0.text: My Trap Card activates! Ring of Destruction!

V0002_08_00_06_0.text: I activate my Quick-Play Spell! Ring of Defense!

V0002_08_00_07_0.text: My Trap Card activates! Destruction Ring!

V0002_08_00_08_0.text: This is just the card I need to take you down.

V0002_08_00_11_0.text: If you didn't already realize how much better I am than you, you'll find out now! I activate Polymerization!

V0002_08_00_12_0.text: This card is the key to my victory!

V0002_09_00_04_0.text: Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End's effect activates!

V0002_09_00_04_1.text: Erase everything with Cemetery of Fire!

V0002_11_00_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Attack Position!

V0002_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0002_13_00_00_0.text: Not a single card can stand up to this!

V0002_13_00_00_1.text: I call on Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

V0002_13_00_01_0.text: Witness the incredible creature of unsurpassed power!

V0002_13_00_02_0.text: Prepare to cower before my Egyptian God!

V0002_13_00_02_1.text: An almighty creature that knows no equal!

V0002_13_00_07_0.text: I Special Summon Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End!

V0002_13_00_08_0.text: I Xyz Summon Legendary Dragon of White!

V0002_13_00_09_0.text: It's like looking in the mirror! Here comes Kaibaman!

V0002_13_00_11_0.text: Only I can do what no other Duelist can do! Hahahahahaha!

V0002_13_00_13_0.text: I Special Summon Tyrant Burst Dragon!

V0002_18_00_00_0.text: My monster attacks your Life Points directly!

V0002_18_00_01_0.text: My monster attacks your Life Points directly!

V0002_19_00_00_0.text: Blue-Eyes! Lay waste to your enemy!

V0002_19_00_01_0.text: Prepare for annihilation! Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, attack!

V0002_19_00_02_0.text: Obelisk! Crush the enemy and bring me victory!

V0002_28_00_00_1.text: You could never defeat a Duelist with talent!

V0002_28_00_01_0.text: You're a third-rate Duelist with a fourth-rate Deck!

V0002_28_00_03_0.text: Out-Dueling Joey Wheeler is no cause for celebration. I could've beaten him blindfolded.

V0002_28_00_04_0.text: Now YOU will call ME the King of Games!

V0002_28_00_05_0.text: You believed that destiny would lead you to victory.

V0002_28_00_05_1.text: But I just proved that destiny is nothing but a joke!

V0002_29_00_00_1.text: But I somehow let it slip away...

V0002_29_00_01_0.text: No! There must be some mistake!

V0002_29_00_03_0.text: Heh. So this is what it feels like to be the worst Duelist in the world.

V0002_29_00_05_0.text: Yugi, I was willing to risk everything to win. But I still couldn't pull it off...

V0002_29_00_06_0.text: Heh, you made a good move. I guess there's a first time for everything.

V0002_30_00_00_0.text: You're learning the hard way that you have no business being here.

V0002_30_00_01_0.text: I don't have time for amateurs! Surrender already!

V0002_30_00_02_0.text: Are you actually trying to think? Is this some lame attempt at a strategy?

V0002_33_00_01_0.text: There's only one champion, and that's me!

V0002_34_00_00_0.text: I've never backed down from a challenge and I don't plan to start today!

V0002_34_00_01_0.text: Heh heh... You're a Duelist worth Dueling... and defeating!

V0002_34_00_02_0.text: I execute my strategies perfectly, something you can never do!

V0002_34_00_03_0.text: Nnng... If you think I'm going to lose, you better check yourself into an insane asylum.

V0002_34_00_04_0.text: Heh, you made a good move. I guess there's a first time for everything.

V0002_34_00_05_0.text: Play your next card! Not that it'll be around for long...

V0002_34_00_06_0.text: Heh... Even if you have a good card, it's worthless if I destroy it!

V0002_34_00_07_0.text: With these cards in my hand, there's no way I'll lose!

V0002_34_00_08_0.text: That's nothing special. I have 36 copies of that card!

V0002_34_00_09_0.text: Nothing will save you from humiliation!

V0002_26_00_01_0.text: Is that the best you got?

V0002_26_00_02_0.text: You'll have to do better than that!

V0002_01_00_09_0.text: If you're showing no mercy, I won't either, Mokuba!

V0002_08_00_30_0.text: I can use this Spell Card to summon higher Level monsters!

V0002_08_00_31_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
The Flute of Summoning Dragon!

V0002_08_00_31_1.text: By playing this flute,  Lord of D. Special Summons a Dragon!

V0002_08_00_32_0.text:
The Quick-Play Spell, Shrink!
It halves a monster's ATK!

V0002_08_00_13_0.text: Even the cards know which Duelist should win!

V0002_08_00_13_1.text: I activate the Spell Card, Lullaby of Obedience!

V0002_08_00_14_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Card of Demise!

V0002_08_00_15_0.text: I activate my Spell Card, Silent Doom!

V0002_08_00_16_0.text: The Quick-Play Spell, Rage with Eyes of Blue!

V0002_08_00_16_1.text: I banish my hand, field and Graveyard to summon Blue-Eyes!

V0002_08_00_17_0.text: With this, Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon can attack three times!

V0002_08_00_17_1.text: And you can't activate effects during these attacks!

V0002_08_00_18_0.text: The Spell Card, Bingo Machine, Go!!!!

V0002_08_00_18_1.text: I add the card you choose to my hand!

V0002_08_00_19_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Burst Stream of Destruction!

V0002_08_00_20_0.text: My Blue-Eyes will paralyze anyone with its glare!

V0002_08_00_20_1.text: The Quick-Play Spell, Majesty with Eyes of Blue!

V0002_08_00_21_0.text: I equip Beacon of White on Blue-Eyes to Special Summon it!

V0002_08_00_22_0.text:
I now activate my Trap!
Cloning!

V0002_08_00_23_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Interdimensional Matter Transporter!

V0002_08_00_24_0.text: Heh! You think you can avoid a fight?

V0002_08_00_24_1.text:
I activate my Continuous Trap!
Final Attack Orders!

V0002_08_00_25_0.text: I'll rip the wings off your strategy!

V0002_08_00_25_1.text:
I activate my virus card!
Virus Cannon!

V0002_08_00_26_0.text: With this Trap, my Blue-Eyes becomes...

V0002_08_00_27_0.text: I activate a Trap from my Graveyard!

V0002_08_00_27_1.text: I Set this card on my field!

V0002_08_00_28_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
The Melody of Awakening Dragon!

V0002_08_00_29_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Dragon Revival Rhapsody!

V0002_09_00_23_0.text: Dragon Spirit of White's effect activates!

V0002_09_00_24_0.text: I now negate your monster's effects!

V0002_09_00_25_0.text: I return Solid Dragon to my deck to bring a new Blue-Eyes!

V0002_09_00_26_0.text: I discard a card to activate The King of D.'s effect!

V0002_09_00_06_0.text: Vampire Lord feeds on your deck!

V0002_09_00_09_0.text: I use Kaibaman's effect to Special Summon Blue Eyes!

V0002_09_00_10_0.text: Doom Virus Dragon destroys monsters with 1500 or more ATK!

V0002_13_00_24_0.text: A, B and C combine into ABC-Dragon Buster!

V0002_13_00_25_0.text: A thru Z join together into A-to-Z-Dragon Buster Cannon!

V0002_13_00_15_0.text: My ultimate monster lets me summon this brilliant dragon!

V0002_19_00_27_0.text:
Take this!
Blue-Eyes Solid Dragon! Attack!

V0002_19_00_09_0.text: Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End attacks!

V0002_28_00_06_0.text: During a Duel, there are no friends or family!

V0002_36_00_05_0.text: Where's your bond of friendship to help you now, Yugi?

V0002_36_00_06_0.text: Finish this Duel for me, Mokuba.
